repairedDockerfile:
# cuda10.0
FROM fineyu/tensorrt7:0.0.1

RUN add-apt-repository -y ppa:timsc/opencv-3.4 && \
    apt-get update && \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y cmake \
    libopencv-dev \
    libopencv-dnn-dev \
    libopencv-shape3.4-dbg && \
    apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/*
